text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Illya Marchenko won the title, defeating Farrukh Dustov in the final, 6–4, 5–7, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Trofeo Città di Brescia - Singles 2014
title: 2014 Trofeo Città di Brescia – Singles
